gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 113, Mavericks 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers rally on a 22-9 run in the final 6:30 to defeat the Mavericks, 113-110.  Caris LeVert led the way with 29 points and seven assists for the Cavaliers, while Jarrett Allen added 24 points and 23 rebounds, his 2nd career 20/20 game, in the victory.  Luka Doncic tallied a game-high 39 points, seven rebounds and six assists for the Mavericks in the losing effort.  The Cavaliers improve to 18-13 on the season, while the Mavericks fall to 18-13.
